Articles.Content:
Hello everyone! I'm MrPopcup and I've been playing this game quite a lot, I Learned alot of it and hopefully I will master it ( Maybe I already did, cause I got to jool and landed on pol !

I gotta say, what an epic/breathtaking forum you guys have!

Have fun! I'm enjoying KSP!

Edited July 25, 2013 by MrPopcup
Welcome to the forums! Nice work on getting to Jool, I just can't get anywhere!

Thanks Capt'n Skunky!

@ Rainbowtrout , Thanks for welcoming me! it was pretty hard and you don't wanna know how many times I restarted! keep going and you'll see!!

You landed on Pol, I can't even get a probe to Pol. I'm trying to map the Jool system for kethane but I got my probes in an orbit going the wrong way! damnit. Oh well, every failure is just another opportunity for success.

Your'e Close to your success!

Keep going man!

@Captain Sierra
